Title: Hole in the Wall
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: After a botched robbery, Raylan stumbles on a mysterious bag in the wall of his father's house. Meanwhile, an old friend pays a visit to Boyd, whose crime business is being threatened by a new church.
